required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: a Clinical Research of CD19 and CD22 Targeted Prime CAR-T Cell in Relapsed/Refractory B Cell Lymphoma
clinical_study.official_title: Study Evaluating Safety and Efficacy of CD19 and CD22 Targeted Prime CAR-T Cell in Patients With Relapsed/Refractory B Cell Lymphoma

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single arm study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of CD19 and CD22 targeted prime CAR-T cells therapy for patients with relapsed/refractory B Cell Lymphoma

detailed_description.textblock:
Although the anti-CD19 CAR-T cell therapies have gained significant results in patients with relapsed and refractory B-cell hematologic malignancies.
There are patients who resisted anti-CD19 CAR-T cells or with CD19 negative relapse. To make further improvement, the investigators launch such a clinical trial using CD19 and CD22 targeted prime CAR-T cells for patients with relapsed and refractory B Cell Lymphomato evaluate the efficacy and safety of CD19 and CD22 targeted prime CAR-T cell therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events that related to treatment
primary_outcome.description: Therapy-related adverse events will be recorded and assessed according to the National Cancer Institute's Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE, Version 5.0)

primary_outcome.measure: The response rate of CD19 and CD22 prime CAR-T treatment in patients with relapse/refractory B Cell Lymphoma
primary_outcome.description: The response rate of CD19 and CD22 prime CAR-T treatment will be recorded and assessed according to the National Comprehensive Cancer Network Guideline

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of prime CAR-T cells in bone marrow
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the rate of prime CAR-T cells in bone marrow by means of flow cytometry

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of prime CAR-T cells in peripheral blood
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the rate of prime CAR-T cells in peripheral blood by means of flow cytometry

secondary_outcome.measure: Quantity of prime CAR copies in bone marrow
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the quantity of prime CAR copies in bone marrow by qPCR

secondary_outcome.measure: Quantity of prime CAR copies in peripheral blood
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the quantity of prime CAR copies in peripheral blood by qPCR

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of CD19 and CD22 positive cells in Bone marrow
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the rate of CD19 and CD22 positive cells in bone marrow by flow cytometry

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Response (DOR) of CD19 and CD22 prime CAR-T treatment in patients with refractory/relapsed B Cell Lymphoma
secondary_outcome.description: DOR will be assessed from the first assessment of CR/CRi to the first assessment of recurrence or progression of the disease or death from any cause (censored)

secondary_outcome.measure: Progress-free survival(PFS) of CD19 and CD22 targeted prime CAR-T treatment in patients with refractory/relapsed B Cell Lymphoma
secondary_outcome.description: PFS will be assessed from the first prime CAR-T cell infusion to death from any cause or the first assessment of progression (censored)

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival(OS) of CD19 and CD22 prime CAR-T treatment in patients with refractory/relapsed B Cell Lymphoma
secondary_outcome.description: OS will be assessed from the first primeCAR-T cell infusion to death from any cause (censored)

arm_group.description: Patients will be be treated with CD19 and CD22 prime CAR- T cells

intervention.intervention_name: CD19 and CD22 targeted prime CAR- T cells
intervention.description: A single infusion of CD19 and CD22 prime CAR-T cells will be administered intravenously

overall_official.affiliation: 920th Hospital of Joint Logistics Support Force of People's Liberation Army of China

facility.name: 920th Hospital of Joint Logistics Support Force
